column4: Hm, how do I install aMSN? Can't find it in Synaptic Package Manager, and I don't know how to 'open' the .deb-file I downloaded from their homepage.
Hm, how do I install aMSN? Can't find it in Synaptic Package Manager, and I don't know how to 'open' the .deb-file I downloaded from their homepage
and whats that? I haven't used linux for 3 years now. and this is the first time I'm using ubuntu :)
it's a script that vastly improves the 'desktop usability' of ubuntu :)
sorry to bother you again but, I got this message when I tried "sudo apt-get update" : http://pastebin.ca/86512
I did, and guess what happened
just get used to wait for apt-get update...especially if your sources file grows...
and if you are on dialup :(
